sentences.sContent: The airplane crashed on a hillside.
They are quarrying the hillside for marble.
sentences.sContent_eng: They are quarrying the hillside for marble.
sentences.sCn: 他们正从山坡上采大理石。

sentences.sContent: They sat and had their lunch on a grassy hillside.
sentences.sContent_eng: They sat and had their lunch on a grassy hillside.
sentences.sCn: 他们坐在长满草的山坡上吃午饭。

trans.tranOther: the sloping side of a hill
